article.title: FoodSafety.gov
article.description:
FoodSafety.gov
[Skip to main content](#main-content)
![U.S. flag](https://www.foodsafety.gov/themes/custom/foodsafety/assets/img/us_flag_small.png)
An official website of the United States government
Here’s how you know
Here’s how you know
![Dot gov](https://www.foodsafety.gov/themes/custom/foodsafety/assets/img/icon-dot-gov.svg)
**Official websites use .gov**
A**.gov**website belongs to an official government organization in the United States.
![Https](https://www.foodsafety.gov/themes/custom/foodsafety/assets/img/icon-https.svg)
**Secure .gov websites use HTTPS**
A**lock**() or**https://**means you’ve safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.
[![Home](https://www.foodsafety.gov/themes/custom/foodsafety/assets/img/fs-logo.png)](https://www.foodsafety.gov/)*[FoodSafety.gov](https://www.foodsafety.gov/)*
Menu
![close](https://www.foodsafety.gov/themes/custom/foodsafety/assets/img/close.svg)
* [Recalls & Outbreaks](https://www.foodsafety.gov/recalls-and-outbreaks)
* Food Safety Charts
* [Food Safety Charts](https://www.foodsafety.gov/food-safety-charts)
* [Cold Food Storage](https://www.foodsafety.gov/food-safety-charts/cold-food-storage-charts)
* [Food Safety During Power Outage](https://www.foodsafety.gov/food-safety-charts/food-safety-during-power-outage)
* [Meat and Poultry](https://www.foodsafety.gov/food-safety-charts/meat-poultry-charts)
* [Safe Minimum Internal Temperatures](https://www.foodsafety.gov/food-safety-charts/safe-minimum-internal-temperatures)
* Keep Food Safe
* [Keep Food Safe](https://www.foodsafety.gov/keep-food-safe)
* [4 Simple Steps](https://www.foodsafety.gov/keep-food-safe/4-steps-to-food-safety)
* [Food Safety by Events and Seasons](https://www.foodsafety.gov/keep-food-safe/food-safety-by-events-and-seasons)
* [Food Safety by Type of Food](https://www.foodsafety.gov/keep-food-safe/food-safety-by-type-food)
* [Food Safety in a Disaster or Emergency](https://www.foodsafety.gov/ke
